text: <@U7SL518D6>, thanks for the reply, yes if you can find out what is the max number that can be entered in, like if it is 10K or more like 500, it would be good to have that information up front, even on the docs would be good

I'm waiting on a firm conclusive answer but it appears the upper limit is 200.

The simple listing page at `/all`,  `<http://your-blog.com/blog/all|your-blog.com/blog/all>` has a higher limit i believe
I tested it ages ago and I think the largest number it would let me put in was something like 99,999, but I have no idea if it will actually pull that many posts.
Also that was years ago, coulda changed
Yeah, the UI doesnt stop you until a crazy high number. I reported that, so hopefully the field won't let you set to over the true limit
